### Load Libraries
```{r}
library(BiocManager)
library(Biostrings)
library(muscle)
library(ape)
library(reshape2)
library(dplyr)
```

### Load Data
```{r}
Data<-read.csv("C:/Users/yeshu/Desktop/Data-Pirates-Project/ConcatenatedSequences.csv")
```

```{r}
str(Data)
```

### Subset Data into smaller Dataset
```{r}
Data1<-Data %>% top_n(3)
Data1
```

```{r}
Data1$Sequence
```

### Align the sequences by using MUSCLE

```{r}
Data1[Data1$X==">EXF7145",]
```

```{r}
Data1$Sequence<-gsub("[^ATCG]", "", Data1$Sequence)
```


```{r}
Data1DNAstring<-DNAStringSet(Data1$Sequence)
```


```{r}
names(Data1DNAstring)<-paste(1:nrow(Data1), Data1$X, sep="_")
```

```{r}
Data1Align<-muscle::muscle(stringset = Data1DNAstring, quiet = T)
```

```{r}
Data1Align
```
